duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain Java-based microservices using Spring Boot and REST API standards
Debug and troubleshoot production issues related to messaging frameworks such as Rabbit MQ
Utilize NOSQL and SQL databases for data storage and retrieval in microservices architecture
Implement caching solutions using Redis Cache and conduct unit and performance testing of microservices
Utilize Docker, Kubernetes, GCP, and Azure for containerization and deployment of enterprise software
Collaborate with the production support team on a rotating basis and adhere to Agile development methodologies

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
